component.name: Kerveros
component.summary: Secure 2FA Code Generator with Master Password Protection

description.p: Kerveros is a robust, cross-platform two-factor authentication (2FA) code generator that combines enterprise-grade security with user-friendly features. Generate time-based one-time passwords (TOTP) for all your online accounts while keeping your secrets encrypted and protected.

ul.li: Master Password Protection: SHA-256 hashing with salting for enhanced security
Encrypted Secret Storage: XOR encryption with initialization vectors
TOTP Code Generation: RFC-compliant time-based one-time passwords
Real-time Code Updates: Automatic refresh every 30 seconds with visual countdown timer
QR Code Import: Drag and drop or file menu import of QR code images
One-Click Copy: Instant clipboard copy with visual feedback
Password Attempt Limiting: 5 attempts before factory reset option
System Tray Integration: Minimize to tray with quick restore
Export/Import Functionality: Full backup and restore capabilities
Single Instance Enforcement: Prevents multiple app conflicts

description.p: Kerveros is designed for security-conscious users who need a reliable, secure, and easy-to-use 2FA code generator with master password protection for all their online accounts including GitHub, Google, PayPal, Discord, and more.
Initial release of Kerveros on Flathub.

ul.li: Master password protection with SHA-256 hashing and salting
Encrypted secret storage using XOR encryption
TOTP code generation with real-time updates
QR code import via drag and drop or file menu
One-click copy to clipboard with visual feedback
Password attempt limiting and factory reset protection
System tray integration and single instance enforcement
Export/import functionality for backup and restore
